statements: UPDATE SatelliteImages SET location = 'Amazon' WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SatelliteImages SET deforestation_detected = TRUE, capture_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE image_id = '456e7890-e12c-23d4-b567-987214365000';
UPDATE SatelliteImages SET deforestation_detected = true WHERE image_id = 'b352955d-2c6b-469c-8b99-7e0fd5359017'
UPDATE SatelliteImages SET location = 'Amazon Rainforest', deforestation_detected = false, capture_date = '2023-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE image_id = 'e6314b21-28d3-4ef7-880b-7d5c1223c876'
UPDATE deforestation_activities SET deforestation_level = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conservation_efforts SET conservation_budget = 100000.00 WHERE initiative_name = 'Reforestation Project';
UPDATE deforestation_activities SET location = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(10, 20), 4326), deforestation_level = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conservation_efforts SET initiative_name = 'Reforestation Project', conservation_budget = 50000.50 WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
UPDATE forest_regions SET region_name = 'Amazon Rainforest', region_description = 'Largest tropical rainforest in the world' WHERE region_id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET captured_date = '2022-10-15', image_url = 'http://example.com/image123.jpg' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE forest_regions SET region_name = 'Amazon Rainforest', region_description = 'Largest tropical rainforest in the world' WHERE region_id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image.jpg', captured_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE image_id = 5;
UPDATE SatelliteImages SET location_geopoint = 'POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE DeforestationAlerts SET alert_type = 'Illegal Logging', alert_message = 'Action Required' WHERE alert_id = 3;
UPDATE SatelliteImages SET image_url = 'http://newimageurl.com' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE DeforestationAlerts SET alert_type = 'High Alert', alert_message = 'Urgent action required' WHERE alert_id = 3;
UPDATE SatelliteImages SET captured_date = '2022-05-15', location_id = 101 WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE DeforestationAreas SET area_size = 125.75, deforestation_level = 'Medium' WHERE area_id = 3;
UPDATE SatelliteImages SET captured_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE DeforestationAreas SET deforestation_level = 'High', area_size = 750.25 WHERE area_id = 3;
